name: Point10 Solutions
tag_list: p10, point10, jatin-chaudhary, hiren-panchasara, education-in-india, jobs10, education10, books10, healthcare10
overview:
Vision: ——– Empowering SMEs with Business Consulting, IT consulting and huge Competent Student Strength to strengthen the Economy. Mission Developing Innovative products with high social impact by engaging Students, Professionals, Academicians and Experts. Building Competent and Ethical Professionals to make stronger India. Collaboration with renowned Institutions and Companies across the globe to bring quality and affordable education for everyone. “Expect Unexpected, Expect Good.”

Company: ————- Point10 is a diversified company focused on building innovative products with high social impact by engaging Students, Industry Professionals, Educationists and Experts. It believes in getting closer to the student community and solve their problems by Mentorship, Career guidance, exposure to realworld projects, and be a pioneer in developing ethical and competent professionals for India. “Point10 Mantra: We might not do Good Business, but we will definitely do Business for Good. ”

Why Point10 ? —————— Quality and Affordable Higher Education for Youth is the most important piece of the puzzle towards building a strong Nation. Lack of basic necessities such as books, equipments, facilities or simply lack of support and guidance. Very few efforts to Foster Innovation in Higher Education System. Inability to visualize and decide on Career roadmap, Goal of their life. Not enough Interaction and engagement with the Industry and Internationally renowned institutions
